H0.text: what type of government does argentina have today. Republic

H1.text: what type of government does argentina have today. Constitutional Monarchy

H2.text: what type of government does argentina have today. Parliamentary Democracy

H3.text: what type of government does argentina have today. Federation

A4.text: The government of Argentina is a presidential representative democratic republic.

A5.text: Argentina is divided into 23 provinces and one autonomous district.

A6.text: Because it is a 'federal' republic Argentina has national, provincial, municipal and Ciudad de Buenos Aires elections.

A7.text: Because of Argentina's federal structure, every province has its own constitution, and authorities.
